channel.title: Im begging, someone please help me?(unsolved for a month!)
channel.description:
how do i do this on a pk planet base? which im not sure what the base of that is, i think delta but im not sure, anyways, no one ever answers this for me, someone please solve my problem? and if ur going to say this:
maxHit = misc.random(10);
or something like that, please dont,i search it and it only shows one thing, im pretty sure theres more than 1 npc on my server........... how do i assign a certain max hit to a certain npc? i want to make abyssal demon hit higher. NPC id: 1615
ive been asking this question for over a month here, no one apparently knows how to do this.. theres no way this is anything higher than basic java.......

EDIT: damn it filefront isn’t working for me. i tried a few other download sites just to be sure it wasn’t my computer and everything worked fine.[/quote]
